pr_title: BAEL-3918 - Adding BigDecimal numbers using the Stream API

timeline.message: BAEL-3918 - Adding BigDecimal numbers using the Stream API
BAEL-3918 - Adding BigDecimal numbers using the Stream API

timeline.bodyText: We generally don't add this at this stage - it's for adding after publishing. Please remove.
timeline.author: ashleyfrieze
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -9,4 +9,5 @@ This module contains articles about the Stream API in Java.
 - [Guide to Java 8’s Collectors](https://www.baeldung.com/java-8-collectors)
 - [Primitive Type Streams in Java 8](https://www.baeldung.com/java-8-primitive-streams)
 - [Debugging Java 8 Streams with IntelliJ](https://www.baeldung.com/intellij-debugging-java-streams)
+- [Add BigDecimals using the Stream API](https://www.baeldung.com/add-bigdecimals-using-the-stream-api/)

timeline.bodyText: Illustrating these functions with unit tests would be preferable. This means you probably don't want to use Random. But you can add up the numbers 0, 1 & 2 from IntStream.range
timeline.author: ashleyfrieze

replies.bodyText: I moved the code to a unit test class
replies.author: fabripautasso
